snippet: Nike is nearing a deal to sell its Cole Haan brand to Apax Partners for about $500 million as the athletic shoe-and-apparel giant looks to streamline its product offerings.
abstract: Nike is nearing a deal to sell its Cole Haan brand to Apax Partners for about $500 million as the athletic shoe-and-apparel giant looks to streamline its product offerings.

headline.main: Nike Nears Deal to Sell Cole Haan to Private Equity Firm
headline.print_headline: Nike Is Said To Be Near Deal to Sell Cole Haan
